title: [Caffe2]How to use ‘Split Operator’ with the second input tensor? I got a segment fault
body_html:
The second Blob’s tensor is on GPU(I think), and its shape is (2,) with content [1000 200], int32 type, I used workspace.FeedBlob and numpy to create it.

And the tensor I want to split has 1200 length on the axis I want to split.

But I got a segment fault when runing this Operator.

Can anyone help me? Thank you very much. Here is my code fragment:

workspace.FeedBlob(core.ScopedName('split'), np.array([1000,200],dtype=np.int32))

model.net.Split(['theBlobToBeSplited','split'],['part1','part2'],axis=0)

And if I use split=(1000,200) as argument, it runs correctly.
